answer_details.question_text: The lungs are part of the human gas exchange system. Breathing moves air into and out of the lungs.

difficulty.justification: Requires understanding of respiratory system components and their functions

sub_questions.text: Match parts of the gas exchange system to their functions using Fig. 1.1
State two features of alveoli that make them suitable for gas exchange
Complete the pie chart titles and key showing gas percentages in the lungs during breathing

images.label: Fig. 1.1
images.description: Diagram showing parts of gas exchange system and their functions

images.label: Fig. 1.2
images.description: Pie charts showing gas percentages in lungs
